value.title: The PiG Daily #32 - Learning How to Scout - Beginner Basics
value.excerpt: "Blood Sacrifice" a unit has to die every minute of the game. Submit replays to eonblu95@gmail.com as attachment. Latest submission is before the monday(US/EU) / tuesday(AUS) daily. (Note: You may need to kill one or two of your own workers in the earlygame to appease the gods) Full Playlist of Daily

value.title: The PiG Daily #47 - Learning From Replays - Beginner Basics
value.excerpt: Timestamps: 1:30 - Common mistakes in analyzing losses 3:00 - People over-emphasise engagements rather than timing + macro 4:00 - The earlier on things are the most important 5:45 - Checking worker production with production tab 4x speed  8:40 - Why are the mistakes happening at these points? 13:30 -

value.title: The PiG Daily #66 - Understanding Jargon Ep 1. Beginner Basics
value.excerpt: THIS WEEKS ICYFAR: "Worker Massacre" - Submit your games with huge numbers of workers dying. Send submissions to eonblu95@gmail.com as attachment. Lastest submission until the second daily of the week (Monday in EU/US, Tuesday in AUS/KR). Full Playlist of Daily VoDs: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFUDU8AOevUdOq5x--TBFC-p54CMWM4Fb
